Class ApplianceConsole

java.lang.Object
mainConsole.ApplianceConsole
public class ApplianceConsole extends Object
Main console interface for managing appliances, providing options to list, search, add, update, and delete appliances in the database. Handles user input and delegates database operations to the DAO layer.
Author:
24862664

      private ApplianceDepartments selectDepartment()

      Returns:
